item.title: Standing/wakling animations
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Can someone tell me where they are located? I’ve checked the Walking class and it doesn’t seem to be in there.

Also, I’m looking to change the standing animation and I’m not sure where that is processed either.

		public void appendAnimationRequest(Stream str) {
		synchronized(this) {
			str.writeWordBigEndian((animationRequest==-1) ? 65535 : animationRequest);
			str.writeByteC(animationWaitCycles);
	}
}

I thought this would be the standing animation, but I’ve tried changing the number and nothing changes.

Any help is appreciated.

Edit: Found but it doesn’t seem to like the animations I put in. The regular stand anim is

0x328

When I replace with a different animation it changes, but not to the correct one. Do they have to be in a certain format?

Read full topic
